product_name: Black Diamond Magnetron RockLock Locking Carabiner
long_description: The Black Diamond Magnetron RockLock locking carabiner uses the power of magnets to give you the security of a locking 'biner with incredible ease of use. Innovative design uses 2 magnetic arms in the gate and a steel insert in the nose of the 'biner for secure and simple closure; gate can be opened with 1 hand. Key lock nose won't snag on pro, ropes or slings, making the 'biner simple to clip. Belay loop is held securely in place when 'biner is opened by the square hinge end. Slightly curved spine of the Black Diamond Magnetron RockLock locking carabiner maximizes the gate opening.
short_description: The Black Diamond Magnetron RockLock locking carabiner uses the power of magnets to give you the security of a locking 'biner with incredible ease of use.
